title: Which variables are equal to 50 after assignments

content.question:
Consider the following code segment.

x <math alttext="← " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> 25
y <math alttext="← " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> 50
z <math alttext="← " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> 75
x <math alttext="← " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> y
y <math alttext="← " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> z
z <math alttext="← " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mo>←</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> x
Which of the variables have the value 50 after executing the code segment?

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Determine the result of code segments.
